body: The blog Vi o Mundo reproduces a letter [pt] by Denise Severo, a researcher at the Universidade de Brasília [University of Brasília], Brazil, to the Embassador of Spain in Brazil complaining that she was illegaly held for 15 hours at a spanish airport without knowing the reasons and deprived of her basic rights while incommunicado for 7 hours. She was later expelled [pt] of the country, adds the blog Conexão Brasília Maranhão.

title: Brazil: Brazilian researcher expelled from Spain
